Vertiv (VRT) Q2 Revenue Jumps 35%
Vertiv(NYSE:VRT), a global supplier of critical digital infrastructure and services for data centers and communication networks, released its second quarter results on July 30, 2025. The release detailed record GAAP revenue gains and a significant beat on non-GAAP earnings expectations. Revenue (GAAP) reached $2,638 million, compared to the analyst consensus of $2,353.9 million. Adjusted diluted earnings per share were $0.95, outpacing the $0.83 consensus. This performance was driven by surging demand for data center solutions, particularly in the Americas and Asia Pacific regions. Despite impressive sales and profit growth, higher supply chain and tariff-related costs pressured adjusted operating margins. Overall, the quarter showcased
Vertiv's strong market traction and its ability to capitalize on accelerating trends in the digital infrastructure space. Source: Analyst estimates provided by FactSet. Management expectations based on management's guidance, as provided in Q1 2025 earnings report. Vertiv provides foundational technologies for digital infrastructure. Its portfolio includes power management products, thermal management systems, racks, enclosures, and remote monitoring solutions. title: The GenAI 'crutch': why teams must learn before they lean | TechRadar
text:
Business leaders must therefore encourage teams to ‚Äòlearn before they lean‚Äô. While these tools can augment our work, they shouldn‚Äôt replace understanding and they should definitely not shortcut learning. When using GenAI, the principle that needs to be adopted is: if you couldn‚Äôt do it yourself, you shouldn‚Äôt use it to do it for you. Chief Technology Officer at Aimii.
Performance and security issues can also slip through the cracks. Without that understanding, they‚Äôre essentially copy-pasting and hoping for the best. After all, these are still just prediction engines - generating what looks right based on patterns, not actual reasoning. This isn‚Äôt just risky - it‚Äôs unsustainable. In highly regulated or mission-critical environments, this can introduce serious operational and reputational risks. Simply put, if the output can‚Äôt confidently be validated, it shouldn‚Äôt be deployed. Because struggle builds skill. Using GenAI before understanding the fundamentals is like handing a student a calculator before they‚Äôve learned arithmetic. It may be faster, but if they don‚Äôt know how the answer was reached, they‚Äôre not in a position to challenge it, build on it, or spot when it‚Äôs wrong.

text: La angustia de tener un pariente desaparecido al llegar la Navidad Sin perder la fe. A meses de su desaparici√≥n, sus familiares contin√∫an con la esperanza de volverla a verla. As√≠ lo demostr√≥ Luis Vallejo, esposo de la docente. ‚ÄúCada vez que llega un veh√≠culo a la casa, esperamos que sea ella, pero nunca llega.‚Äù Asimismo, expres√≥ que esta √©poca no es igual a las anteriores, la falta de su esposa ha cambiado sus tradiciones, ‚ÄúEsta navidad ya no es la misma, cuando ella estaba aqu√≠ hac√≠amos cena de nochebuena, pero este a√±o fuimos donde otros familiares, porque sin ella, ya no es lo mismo‚Äù, expres√≥ Vallejo. 22 a√±os sin saber de √©l Rafael Antonio Tapia Rodr√≠guez, padre de cinco hijos, sali√≥ de su residencia en Jarabacoa, el 1 de diciembre de 2001, sin decir hacia d√≥nde se dirig√≠a. Al d√≠a de hoy con 22 a√±os de desaparecido, sus familiares mantienen la esperanza de que regrese. ‚ÄúMi familia y yo no creemos que a√∫n este muerto, hasta que no veamos su cuerpo (‚Ä¶) Cada diciembre nos quedamos nost√°lgicos, con la esperanza de que √©l a√∫n aparezca‚Äù,‚Äù expres√≥ Rosa Tapia, sobrina del desaparecido. Sin perder la esperanza Estas familias, al igual que muchas otras, mantienen la esperanza de encontrar a sus parientes desaparecidos, ya sea con vida o sin vida, con el fin de calmar su angustia y encontrar respuestas. Esperan alg√∫n d√≠a poder recibir noticias que les brinden la paz y la posibilidad de poder cerrar este cap√≠tulo. A junio 2023 Una cr√≥nica de la periodista Jhangeyli Dur√°n, de mediados de a√±os, revela que a junio ya sumaban por lo menos 30 las personas desaparecidas, una cifra que cada a√±o se incrementa, pues para junio 2022 solo se contabilizaban 13 desapariciones. La periodista narra que de esas 30 personas, la Polic√≠a Nacional solo ten√≠a conocimiento de 10 y los restantes eran publicados por sus familiares en las redes sociales, que en algunas ocasiones no acud√≠an a los organismos judiciales para presentar denuncia de la desaparici√≥n. Datos estad√≠sticos Seg√∫n informaciones de la Polic√≠a Nacional, del 2017 a 2021 fueron registrados unos 652 casos de desapariciones, siendo el 2021 el de mayor n√∫mero con 160 casos. La Polic√≠a Nacional en su informe m√°s reciente explic√≥ que han resuelto 53 casos de personas que hab√≠an sido reportadas como desaparecidas en el per√≠odo comprendido de marzo a mayo de 2022. Da√±os emocionales A consecuencia de este drama, muchas familias se vuelve v√≠ctimas indirectas, ya que enfrenta la ausencia y desconocimiento del paradero de su pariente. author: Katie Sergent | News Channel 3

text: WAKESHMA TOWNSHIP, Mich. ‚Äî An alleged West Michigan shooting has turned into a swatting investigation. Michigan State Police and Kalamazoo County deputies were called to Wakeshma Township at 11 a.m. Thursday after someone called about a shooting. That call, however, was found to be illegitimate, prompting authorities to investigate the alleged shooting as a "swatting call," according to state police on Twitter. Swatting, according to [Merriam Webster](https://www.merriam-webster.com/dictionary/swat), means to make a fake report of an ongoing crime to "elicit a response from law enforcement (such as the dispatch of a SWAT unit)." "MSP would like to remind residents that these calls tie up valuable resources and are taken seriously," troopers said in a statement. "This case will be investigated to its fullest extent to identify & hold accountable those responsible for this incident." Anyone with information about this incident is asked to call Kalamazoo Silent Observer at 269-343-2100 or the Michigan State Police Paw Paw Post At 269-657-5551.
